testCase.name: CharacterDetailPage renders character details correctly
render AboutPage component
CharacterDetail component renders character image, description and modification date
CharacterDetail component renders default description when no description is available
CharacterDetail component renders default modification date when no modification date is available
render ContactPage component
CharactersList component renders the correct number of characters and a link for each character
CharactersList component renders an empty list when no characters are provided
CharactersList component renders when nothing is provided
CharactersPage Component renders CharactersPage component correctly
CharactersPage Component updates sort and order parameters when dropdowns are changed
getCharacters should return characters sorted by name in ascending order by default
getCharacters should return characters sorted by name in descending order
getCharacters should return characters sorted by modified date in ascending order
getCharacters should return characters sorted by modified date in descending order
getCharacters should return characters sorted by name in descending order using custom sort function
getCharacterById should return the character with the provided id
getCharacterById should throw an error if the character with the provided id does not exist
renders "There is no character" when characters array is empty
renders the correct number of characters when characters array is not empty
renders "There is no character" when no characters are provided
renders "There is one character" when one character is provided
